channel.title: Survival Games - The official - can you can survive?
channel.description:
[center][img]https://argonite.net/forum/public/style_images/deviant3/logo.png[/img]
[url=http://"https://argonite.net/?section=register"][img]http://i.imgur.com/q3CcRqU.png[/img][/url] [url=http://"https://argonite.net/play/survival-games"][img]http://i.imgur.com/cO2dne6.png[/img] [/url][url=http://"https://argonite.net/forum"][img]http://i.imgur.com/tSPMmUR.png[/img][/url]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/RfiJTim.png[/img]
Survival Games is a completely survival game. All players gets teleported to the map and spawns around the started loot.
A timer will begin, and count down from 10 to 0. Once the timer hits 0, players can attack each other.
The point is to survive, and be the last standing player. After the timer hits 0, people are able to move, and open the center chests.
The system will spawn random chests around the map. We have four types of chests.
Bronze, Maple, Gold, Treasure.
Treasure chest only spawns upon Treasure Drop, or at Final stages. There can be total of four Treasure Chests in the game.
[b]Chesting[/b]
We have a very advanced chesting system, allows players to see what items there are, take them aswell. The chests are live, means anyone can take items at the same time, the first to click gets the item he selected.
We also have implemented a very nice chest interface aswell.
[b]Treasure Drop[/b]
Treasure drop is a situation where a 10x10 place spawns anywhere in the map, and gets announced. The Treasure Drop contains 2 Gold chests, 1 Treasure chest, and 4 Maple chests. There will only be two Treasure Drops in the tournament.
[b]Servers[/b]
After the game starts, you will have to wait for the game to end, but don't worry! We have multiple servers to offer you with automatic server switching.
Survival Games A is in progress? No problem! Try Survival Games B.
We will do our best to offer our players the best gaming experience.
So... this is not everything! Are you sure you can survive?
KITS
[b]Warrior[/b] - Comes with a iron sword, iron helmet. Abilities: 5% Strength bonus, ability to hit a special melee move.
[b]Archer[/b] - Comes with Arrows, a bow, chaps, leather body. Abilities: 5% Ranging bonus, ability to hit special range move.
[b]Witch[/b] - Comes with a wizard set, a staff. Abilities: Always shot fire wave with your staff, using no runes.
[b]Assassin[/b] - Comes with fancy boots. Abilities: Operate your boots for 200% strength,attack bonus, and -100% defence bonus.
[b]Cannibal [/b]- Comes with a black scimitar, 3 pieces of lobsters. Abilities: Each damage you deal may poison your opponent. Each player you kill will increase your hunger by 10.
[b]Revenant[/b] - Each soul you take will increase your defence by 3%, and reset prayer back to 100%.
Buy kits here: https://argonite.net/shop/
[img]http://i.imgur.com/JIth6eQ.png[/img]
[b]0.4.0[/b]
New features
New map: Al Kharid (Hardcore, small). New starter interface: Select your favorited map (vote) Food may burnt while cooking. New kit: Cannibal Comes with: Black Scimitar, 3 pieces of lobsters. Abilities: Every hit has a chance of poisoning the opponent. When you kill your opponent, you will get +10 hunger. New kit: Revenant Comes with: Nothing Abilities: Every player you kill, will increase your defence by 3%, and the defence percent will never go down unless the game has ended. Prayer will reset to 100% upon each player kill.
Bug fixes / Modifications
Random disconnections should be fixed now. Sometimes, Treasure drop, chests could land on lava/water. This has been fixed. Game timer changed to 25 minutes, it was 40 minutes. Increased hunger down time speed. If you're in Al Kharid, hunger percent will decrease faster. If you're in Al Kharid, less chests will be dropped, because of the map size. Updated run energy formula. Fixed the bug when you purchase a kit & don't have it. Updated our kits store - When you purchase a kit, a fancy text will slide down "Successfully purchased kit!". Fixed some doors that wouldn't open.
[b]0.3.0:[/b]
- Fishing - Players can now fish Rocktails, Manta Rays, Sharks, Swordfish and Lobsters. The player will have a 1 minute cooldown after fishing 10 fish. Available Fishing spots: Wilderness fishing (2 spots, see image below). Wilderness Swamp - Rocktails only (See image below). - Cooking - Players can now cook Rocktails, Manta Rays, Sharks, Swordfish, Lobsters. Players will have a 100% chance of successfully cooking the fish, however in patch 0.3.1, this will be changed. Available cooking spots: Randomly distributed around the map. - Run Energy - Run energy has been added into the game. - Resource Chest - A new chest has been added into the game. This chest will contain: All combat potions, pray potions and fishing rods.
Bug fixes
- People could log out and vote again, and then the vote would count. - Vote percent has been replaced with a full number format. - Massive lag spikes bug has been fixed. - The server will no longer disconnect at some point, we have implemented a few stability and system tweaks to the server. - The weird icon that was popping up when Treasure Drop was activated was removed.
[img]http://i.imgur.com/myXavTP.png[/img]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/qHe2hDu.png[/img][img]http://i.imgur.com/3e7dMB0.png[/img][img]http://i.imgur.com/V6aUyAo.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/SvitRqm.png[/img][img]http://i.imgur.com/USJiOuy.png[/img][img]http://i.imgur.com/HiRWd86.png[/img]
[img]http://gyazo.com/b118b58e48419e3c366710ea698a5c90.png[/img]
[img]http://www.runelocus.com/images/server_uploads/34751_38354.png[/img][/center]

item.title: Survival Games - The official - can you can survive?
item.dc:creator: @jonyFX jonyFX
item.description:
@jonyFX wrote:

[center]

Survival Games is a completely survival game.
All players gets teleported to the map and spawns around the started loot.

A timer will begin, and count down from 10 to 0. Once the timer hits 0, players can attack each other.

The point is to survive, and be the last standing player.
After the timer hits 0, people are able to move, and open the center chests.

The system will spawn random chests around the map. We have four types of chests.

Bronze, Maple, Gold, Treasure.

Treasure chest only spawns upon Treasure Drop, or at Final stages. There can be total of four Treasure Chests in the game.

Chesting

We have a very advanced chesting system, allows players to see what items there are, take them aswell. The chests are live, means anyone can take items at the same time, the first to click gets the item he selected.

We also have implemented a very nice chest interface aswell.

Treasure Drop

Treasure drop is a situation where a 10x10 place spawns anywhere in the map, and gets announced. The Treasure Drop contains 2 Gold chests, 1 Treasure chest, and 4 Maple chests.
There will only be two Treasure Drops in the tournament.

Servers

After the game starts, you will have to wait for the game to end, but don’t worry! We have multiple servers to offer you with automatic server switching.

Survival Games A is in progress? No problem! Try Survival Games B.

We will do our best to offer our players the best gaming experience.

So… this is not everything! Are you sure you can survive?

KITS

Warrior - Comes with a iron sword, iron helmet.
Abilities: 5% Strength bonus, ability to hit a special melee move.

Archer - Comes with Arrows, a bow, chaps, leather body.
Abilities: 5% Ranging bonus, ability to hit special range move.

Witch - Comes with a wizard set, a staff.
Abilities: Always shot fire wave with your staff, using no runes.

Assassin - Comes with fancy boots.
Abilities: Operate your boots for 200% strength,attack bonus, and -100% defence bonus.

Cannibal - Comes with a black scimitar, 3 pieces of lobsters.
Abilities: Each damage you deal may poison your opponent. Each player you kill will increase your hunger by 10.

Revenant - Each soul you take will increase your defence by 3%, and reset prayer back to 100%.

Buy kits here: https://argonite.net/shop/

0.4.0

New features

New map: Al Kharid (Hardcore, small).
New starter interface: Select your favorited map (vote)
Food may burnt while cooking.
New kit: Cannibal
Comes with: Black Scimitar, 3 pieces of lobsters.
Abilities: Every hit has a chance of poisoning the opponent. When you kill your opponent, you will get +10 hunger.
New kit: Revenant
Comes with: Nothing
Abilities: Every player you kill, will increase your defence by 3%, and the defence percent will never go down unless the game has ended. Prayer will reset to 100% upon each player kill.

Bug fixes / Modifications

Random disconnections should be fixed now.
Sometimes, Treasure drop, chests could land on lava/water. This has been fixed.
Game timer changed to 25 minutes, it was 40 minutes.
Increased hunger down time speed.
If you’re in Al Kharid, hunger percent will decrease faster.
If you’re in Al Kharid, less chests will be dropped, because of the map size.
Updated run energy formula.
Fixed the bug when you purchase a kit & don’t have it.
Updated our kits store - When you purchase a kit, a fancy text will slide down “Successfully purchased kit!”.
Fixed some doors that wouldn’t open.

0.3.0:

  • Fishing - Players can now fish Rocktails, Manta Rays, Sharks, Swordfish and Lobsters. The player will have a 1 minute cooldown after fishing 10 fish.
    Available Fishing spots:
    Wilderness fishing (2 spots, see image below).
    Wilderness Swamp - Rocktails only (See image below).
  • Cooking - Players can now cook Rocktails, Manta Rays, Sharks, Swordfish, Lobsters.
    Players will have a 100% chance of successfully cooking the fish, however in patch 0.3.1, this will be changed.
    Available cooking spots: Randomly distributed around the map.
  • Run Energy - Run energy has been added into the game.
  • Resource Chest - A new chest has been added into the game.
    This chest will contain: All combat potions, pray potions and fishing rods.

Bug fixes

  • People could log out and vote again, and then the vote would count.
  • Vote percent has been replaced with a full number format.
  • Massive lag spikes bug has been fixed.
  • The server will no longer disconnect at some point, we have implemented a few stability and system tweaks to the server.
  • The weird icon that was popping up when Treasure Drop was activated was removed.


[/center]
